Gummi  A Bendable Computer  Carsten Schwesig  Interaction Lab, Sony CSL Takanawa Muse Building 3 14 13 Higashigotanda Shinagawa ku, Tokyo  141 0022 Japan  Ivan Poupyrev  Interaction Lab, Sony CSL Takanawa Muse Building 3 14 13 Higashigotanda Shinagawa ku, Tokyo  141 0022 Japan  Eijiro Mori  Creative Development Group  Sony Design Center 6 7 35 Kitashinagawa Shinagawa ku, Tokyo  141 0001 Japan  ABSTRACT Gummi is an interaction technique and device concept based  on physical deformation of a handheld device. The device  consists of several layers of flexible electronic components,  including  sensors  measuring  deformation  of  the  device.  Users  interact  with  this  device  by  a  combination  of  bending and 2D position control. Gummi explores physical  interaction  techniques  and  screen  interfaces  for  such  a  device.
